item.description:
MacGruber is funny on SNL in 19-second installments. Who'da thunk it'd be funny for a whole movie? Certainly not me.

Surprise! MacGruber was a big hit at SxSW, and the trailer is really funny. Let's give it a shot at the end of May - Sunday of Memorial Day weekend. The movie is playing at Showcase in Worcester at 5:20 PM, so let's meet in the lobby at 4:50 PM.

MacGruber is Will Forte's MacGyver parody on Saturday Night Live. He's a spy and an expert at disabling bombs. Unfortunately, his personal problems always seem to interrupt his work.

Here's a description and other information from IMDb: http://www.imdb.com/t...
And more information from moviefone.com: http://www.moviefone....

- David

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: MacGruber
